column1: Kata Robata////The last thing we ordered was the award winning lobster macaroni and cheese. Nothing captivates a girl's heart better than lobster
column2: and macaroni and cheese... I was in heaven! If you're still skeptical about how macaroni and cheese can be THIS good... I dare you to order this. I was skeptical too but after my first bite I couldn't stop eating it. There's huge chunks of lobster in the macaroni
column3: and the cheese is salty and creamy but not soupy like other places. Just try it and don't worry about the price. Just let yourself go. Trust me
